channel.title: design on Stitch-n-Glue
channel.description: Recent content in design on Stitch-n-Glue

item.title: 20. Launch!
item.description: At last it is time to launch these vessels and see how they perform. The first will be a family-only “soft” launch event. Later I’ll schedule a public “launch party”.

item.title: 5. Panels Cut
item.description: It is a relief… to be finished with cutting out the panels. I anticipated it would be challenging but it took much longer than I expected.

item.title: 2. Sourcing Materials
item.description: It’s time to start the project by ordering plans and materials! I narrowed down my choices but still agonized over the final decisions.

item.title: 1. The Dream
item.description: I’ve been dreaming of owning a fast, light kayak for years…decades really. I got the bug shortly after moving to Sarasota on Florida’s Gulf coast in 2000.

item.title: 0. Links to Other Builds
item.description: I’m not the only builder who has documented their stitch-n-glue kayak project.
